Producer: Chosei Funahara, Tadanobu Hirao, Yousuke Nagata, Akiuh Suzuki, Hank Blumenthal
Distributor: Transmission Films Ltsd. [us], Northern Arts Entertainment
Synopsis: A Japanese call girl (Miho Nikaido) buys a topaz ring and associates with a drug-addicted contemporary (Sayoko Amano).
Title: Tokyo Decadence
